    shipr

    Package creation

    setup

    library(devtools)
devtools::setup()

    data

    devtools::use_data_raw()

    Move data files into data-raw/, then sbais.R to generate sbais.csv and load into data/ with:

    usethis::use_data(sbais, overwrite = TRUE)

    vignettes

    devtools::use_vignette("intro")
